description:
The main fabric is a hightech, windproof, and extremely light 100% recycled 7D nylon material made in Japan. It offers great packability and lightweight, and is durable for its weight. To achieve an excellent warmth-to-weight ratio, the jacket is filled with high-quality, RDS-certified 850 goose down.

This jacket came to life as the ultimate down sweater made to give max warmth and packability-to-weigh in a minimalistic and adaptable package. You can use it both as a mid-layer and outer layer, making it a 4-season garment. Features are kept minimalistic and clean to follow the design expression.

The jacket has a slim fit with a longer cut in the back for extra protection. The Y-shaped fit ensures good mobility. To ensure an even and lasting distribution of down, it’s tightly quilted
name: Norrona Trollveggen Superlight Down850 Jacket - Mens
